nodes.text: A textfile was a type of media that existed in the galaxy. Textfiles were essentially a type of document.
The New Republic document Why Do We Fight the Empire?, which was produced by Mon Mothma in 10 ABY, was classified as a textfile.

Brollyx, an Assistant-Viceprex of the Corporate Sector Authority's Security Police, was given several textfiles by Hokkor Long, the Secretary in charge of scheduling for the Imperial Entertainers' Guild, when Brollyx sued the company for the destruction of Stars' End.
